tool_description: Check DA, PA, Backlinks, etc. for a domain. Returns data from moz, majestic, majestic, and social networks.
name: Domain Metrics Check
title: Domain Metrics Check

api_list.name: Check Domain Metrics
api_list.description: Checks the metrics of the given domain
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-metrics-check.p.rapidapi.com/domain-metrics/iamrizwan.me/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-metrics-check.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-metrics-check.p.rapidapi.com/domain-metrics/{domain}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-metrics-check.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
